# Maul of the Titans
## Overview
**Aura** strong evocation; **CL** 15th

**Slot** —

**Price** 25,305 gp

**Weight** 160 lbs.

**Description**

This mallet is 8 feet long. If used as a weapon, it is the equivalent of a +3 greatclub and deals triple damage against inanimate objects. The wielder must have a Strength of at least 18 to wield it properly. Otherwise, she takes a –4 penalty on attack rolls. 

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Clenched Fist (Spell)|clenched fist]]*

**Cost** xxx gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 523
